name: Kinder bueno
details: Kinder Bueno chocolate combines creamy hazelnut filling and crispy wafer layers, delivering a delightful balance of sweetness and crunch in every bite.

name: Amul Milk Chocolate
details: Amul Milk is a popular brand of dairy milk in India, known for its rich taste and high quality, offered in various types including full cream, toned, and double toned.

name: Kitkat White
details: KitKat White is a variant of the classic KitKat chocolate bar, featuring crispy wafer layers covered in creamy white chocolate, offering a smooth and sweet twist on the traditional milk chocolate version.

name: Dairy Milk
details: Smooth and creamy milk chocolate beloved worldwide for its rich taste.

name: Wellchoco
details: Wellchoco: A delightful blend of rich cocoa and smooth milk, crafted to indulge your senses.

name: Roerat
details: Roerat Choco Oatmeal Coating Puff Ball CH-D087: Crispy cookie ball with white chocolate cream filling, coated in chocolate oatmeal.

name: Hazelnut Heaven
details: Milk chocolate bar generously filled with whole hazelnuts.

name: Mint Chocolate Chip
details: Dark chocolate with natural peppermint and chocolate chips.
